alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 23 at 6:26PM MST until August 23 at 9:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 930 PM MST. * At 626 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms produced between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain across the area around Willis Ranch and Stockton Hill Road. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Willis Ranch and Stockton Hill Road FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
